reviews.review: Muy bueno juego, de mis favoritos, lo sigo jugando en 2019 a pesar de los graficos de 2004, simplemente no te aburre.
really fun better then the first half life in my opinion
This game is still a great masterpiece and still holds up strong
Much better than the first game.  Each and every level is different from the last.  The game has innovated gaming forever and is a real stepping stone towards perfection in gaming.

É um ótimo jogo. 

Mesmo tendo gráficos antigos, é uma belíssima continuação de Half-Life, usando mecânicas diferentes do primeiro jogo, não dando aquele aspecto repetitivo que vemos em sequências de jogos e filmes.

First of I want people to know I love valve. It is nice that valve is making games again however it is a shame that valve is focusing on VR, since it is nothing but a gimmick like the wii sure it was popular for a while but ultimately it is an expensive fad that will go away, hopefully Valve will continue making games but only for pc since basically no one  cares about vr and never will. (Oh and the new cartoon style/redesigns of characters in half life alyx is horrible.

I hate vr it is expensive, I have the money to buy the valve index but ultimately i don't care for vr i tried it it is pretty bad is nothing but a gimmick a fad like nintendo wii controllers or the xbox kinect that no one used and that people thought it was going to be "revolutionary" what valve should do is make new games such as half life 3, left for dead 3 and focus on supporting their current games such as csgo and tf2 instead of letting their players leave to overwatch and r6 because the lack of content or simply stupid decisions as making csgo pay 2 win leaving the game open to hackers to get new accounts instead of buying them & playing with in prime, and lastly allowing people to pay money for agents/operators that literally camouflage into maps (make us pay for new models instead of making them free like before literally making us pay for content we used to get for free) and break the art style of the game (all cartoony like the new terrorist models for dust 2) it looks like is made by a chinese company as a free 2 play csgo rip off oh wait.
Ravenholm me pone igual de nervioso como lo hacía hace 14 años
ยังคงสนุกแม้ผ่านมานานแต่ไม่ได้ไปต่อ

It feels like it may be excessive to make a review for this game, as basically all the reviews are positive and I doubt anyone would read this, but I've really wanted to write a review for this among the hype of Half Life Alyx, so I'm going to.

This game is something different. This game is another experience. If you are getting into video games, this is a great start.

This game is amazing, the atmosphere, the story, the interaction, the puzzles, the gameplay.
Hearing the sirens of the citadel while replaying this gave me chills.
The characters are very like-able and interesting.
The fights always feel interesting, with bits of the environment aiding you in your fight against the combine.
The puzzles make you think, but aren't frustrating for the most part.

If you have never played this game. I HIGHLY recommend it.
Its an experience like no other.
It gets you invested. The gameplay is always refreshing. The story and characters are incredible.
We may never get a third episode or game, but atleast we were left with this masterpiece of a game (along with the 2 other episodes).

LA franquicia! MUST de los MUSTS! Mi half life favorito. Es un shooter de hace 20 años que aun ahora es increible de jugar. Las ultimas horas son un poco duras de repetitivo que se siente pero vale la pena.

A genre defining title and, well deserved, game of the decade winner, that spawned a highly modifiable game engine developed for it that is still in use to this day today, and looking like new.

Can't believe I hadn't yet reviewed this game. It's one of the best ever made, and I've replayed it about a billion times. HL1 and HL2 are both good, but I prefer HL2; and the HL2 episodes are also excellent, but nothing beats HL2's story and progression. The best representation of the hero's journey, in my opinion.
